name: Six Degrees of Separation
description:
This is a "meet" simulator made for LD38, the theme is "A Small World".

According to the "Six Degrees of Separation" theory, this is a small world, you will meet the girl of your dreams eventually. However, it requires patience and your smart moves.

You are the guy. Your goal is to meet the girl.

You can click on person to know more about them and click the button to make friends with them. You friends will be surrounded with a box.

In the bottom is . Make friends during different news will have different effects.

Normally, friendship only costs you 1 .

Try earn some coins from the right person on the right time.

Click button to read game rules.
